secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with a traditional beach day can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "towel" and "sunscreen".
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring a "beach umbrella" to the game?
Yes, you can bring a beach umbrella.
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "flip-flops" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "sunglasses" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "swimsuit" to the game?
Yes, you can bring a swimsuit.

Based on the examples and the conversation history, the secret rule seems to be that you can bring items typically associated with going to the beach or beach activities. The items mentioned, such as "towel," "sunscreen," "beach umbrella," "flip-flops," "sunglasses," and "swimsuit," all fit this theme. So, my best guess is that the rule is: "You can bring items that are commonly used or needed at the beach."
Correct! The rule is: Only items that are typically associated with a traditional beach day can be brought to the picnic.
